DataSource.Name: Default

RichDescItem.Description:
Paid Transaction Items Report

Abstract

“Paid Transaction Items Report” will give you all the paid transactions in a selected Location in a selected period at your choice sorted by date and time.

Generating the report

Parameter Input
In generating the report, parameter input features intuitive interface.
Built-in wizards will help you quickly and easily create at your choice profile for your site by
 
  • [From date – To Date] – Period to be analysed, easy-to-select.
    • Note: The dates if not specified are to be considered “Fiscal Date”
  • [Location] – Site Location Name, easy-to-select. Selecting -empty-, default is all the locations
  • [Operating Area] – Site Operating Area name, easy-to-select. Selecting -empty-, default is all the Operating Areas
  • [Entity Change ID] – Last Tracked Entity ID. If blank, all the Entity ID will be shown
Output File Extension
“Paid Transaction Items Report” generates reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Selection is required before running the report.
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:
  • [Execution date/time] -Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [From date – To Date] – Selected Period
  • [Location] – Site Location Name
  • [Operating Area] – Site Operating Area Name
  • [Entity Change ID] – Last Tracked Entity ID. Report data are order by Entity Change ID. If blank, the report will whow all the tracked Entity ID.
 

Contents (by Columns)

The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information
  • [Transaction Date] – Sale Date. Display format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [Transaction Time] – Sale Timing. Display format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [Sale Item ID] - Sale Item ID
  • [Transaction ID] – Transaction ID
  • [Sale Code (PNR)] - Reservation number/PNR
  • [Client ID] – Guest/Organization ID
  • [Client Code] – Guest/Organization Code
  • [Client User Name] – Guest/Organization Username
  • [Client Login Email] – Guest/Organization Login Mail address
  • [Client Name] - Guest/Organization Name. Display format: if Guest: “Last Name, First Name”. If Organization: Company Name
  • [Client Category] –Guest/Organization Category
  • [Sale Channel Code] - Sale Channel Code
  • [Sale Channel Name] - Sale Channel Name
  • [Order Location Code] – Site Order Location Code
  • [Order Location Name] - Site Order Location Name 
  • [Order Operating Area Code] – Site Order Operating Area Code
  • [Order Operating Area Name] – Site Order Operating Area Name
  • [Order Workstation Code] - Order Workstation Code
  • [Order Workstation Name] – Order Workstation Name
  • [Order Username] - Order Username
  • [Order Login Mail] - Order User Login Mail Address (OrdLoginEmail)        
  • [Order User] - Order Account User Name. Display format “Last Name”, “First Name”
  • [Transaction Location Code] - Transaction Site Location Code
  • [Transaction Location Name] - Transaction Site Location Name
  • [Transaction Op Area Code] - Transaction Site Operating Area Code
  • [Transaction Op Area Name] - Transaction Site Operating Area Name
  • [Transaction Workstation Code] - Transaction Workstation Code
  • [Transaction Workstation Name] - Transaction Workstation Name
  • [Transaction User Name] - Transaction Username
  • [Transaction Login Email] - Transaction Username Login Mail Address
  • [Transaction User] - Transaction Account User Name. Display format “Last Name”, “First Name”
  • [Transaction Serial Number] –Transaction Daily Serial Number
  • [Transaction Type Code] – Transaction Type Code # 1 .. 100 (see LOOKUP TABLES >> Transaction Type)
  • [Transaction Type Label] – Transaction Type Description (see LOOKUP TABLES >> Transaction Type)
  • [Approved] – Approval Status. Display Format “TRUE” or “FALSE”
  • [Paid] – Payment Status. Display Format “TRUE” or “FALSE”
  • [Encoded] – Encoding Status. Display Format “TRUE” or “FALSE”
  • [Printed] – Printing Status. Display Format “TRUE” or “FALSE”
  • [Validated] – Validation Status. Display Format “TRUE” or “FALSE”
  • [Product Code] – Product Code
  • [Product Name] – Product Name
  • [Deposit Account ID] – Deposit Account ID
  • [Deposit Account Code] – Deposit Account Code
  • [Deposit Account Name] – Deposit Account Name
  • [Quantity] – Quantity of product #
  • [Unit Tax] – Tax per single unit, in local currency
  • [Unit Amount] – Price per single unit, in local currency
  • [Unit Attribute Amount] – Amount per single attribute unit, in local currency
  • [Total Tax] – Total Tax Amount, in local currency
  • [Total Due Amount]- Total Transaction Amount, in local currency
  • [Paid Amount] – Total Paid Amount per Transaction, in local currency
  • [Paid Tax] – Total Tax Paid
  • [Print Group] – Print Group
  • [Finance Group] – Finance Group
  • [Admission Group] – Admission Group
  • [Area Group] – Area Group
  • [Attribute Items] – Attribute Items
  • [Tags] – Tag Name
  • [Payments] –Payment Type and Values. Display format: “Type of payment=Value X | Type of payment=Value Y | Type of payment = Value Z|”
  • [Entity Change ID] – Last Tracked Entity ID
